titleStmt.title: Description of Folger Shakespeare Library, MS V.a.83: De arte amandi manuscript, ca. 1400? / Ovidius.

notesStmt.note: Ricci, S. de. Census of medieval and Renaissance manuscripts in the United States and Canada, SM.4

msContents.summary: Contains Ovid's Ars amatoria, preceded by introductory notes.

msItem.title: De arte amandi manuscript, ca. 1400? / Ovidius.
msItem.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 A.D. or 18 A.D., author.

respStmt.persName: Smedley, William T. (William Thomas), 1851-1934, former owner.
Folger, Emily C. J. (Emily Clara Jordan), 1858-1936, former owner.

msItem.title: De arte amandi (Book One)
msItem.incipit: [rubr.] Incipit Ouidius de arte amandi. [text] Siquis in hoc artem populo non nouit amandi ...
msItem.explicit: ... Hic teneat nostras anchora iacta rates. [f. 19r]

msItem.title: De arte amandi (Book Two)
msItem.incipit: Dicite yo pean et yo bis dicite Paen ...
msItem.explicit: ... Vos eritis chartae proxima cura mee. [f. 34v]

msItem.title: De arte amandi (Book Three)
msItem.incipit: Arma dedi Danais in Amazonas arma supersunt ...
msItem.explicit: ... Inscribant spoliis Naso magister erat. Pagina Nasonis hec artem monstrat amoris. [f. 51v]

layoutDesc.layout: Written in 23 to 24 long lines (dimensions of written space: 155 x 90 mm); below line; framed-ruled in lead with double inner and outer vertical bounding lines; continuous glossed commentary ruled in outer and inner columns. Continuous glossed commentary on both sides of the main column and at the foot of each leaf; continuous interlinear notes with a few manicules throughout.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Carefully written in an Italian Gothic "Rotunda" hand.

decoDesc.decoNote: Decorated zoomorphic initial (pelican with a fish) on leaf 3r; Penwork initials in red and gold on leaves 3r to 34v.

binding.p: Bound in late 17th-century calf with gold tooled spine; printed waste.

history.provenance: Formerly owned by Paulus de Vannis; Lord Mostyn; and W.T. Smedley (bookplate); Purchased as part of the Smedley Collection in 1924 by Henry Clay Folger.
